Get data from Planit API

Source: R/planit.R
get_planit_data.Rd

This function requests data from [planit.org.uk](https://www.planit.org.uk). See their [API spec](https://www.planit.org.uk/api/) and their [data dictionary](https://www.planit.org.uk/dictionary/) for further information.

get_planit_data(
  query_type = "applics",
  query_value = NULL,
  fmt = "geojson",
  base_url = "https://dev.planit.org.uk",
  limit = 6,
  end_date = as.character(Sys.Date()),
  start_date = "2000-02-01",
  auth = NULL,
  pcode = NULL,
  krad = NULL,
  bbox = NULL,
  app_size = NULL,
  app_state = NULL,
  app_type = NULL,
  silent = FALSE
)

Arguments

query_type

The type of query (`"applics"` by default)
query_value

Text string associated with the `query_type`. To be used only when `query_type` is not `"applics"`.
fmt

The format of the output (`"geojson"` returns an `sf` object, `"json"` returns a data frame)
base_url

The base URL of the service
limit

How many items to return (e.g. 6, default)
end_date

E.g. `"2009-02-01"`. Default is `as.character(Sys.Date())`.
start_date

The earliest application (date of application) to be filtered `"2000-02-01"`
auth

Authority name
pcode

Postcode = UK postcode to use for the centre of a location search
krad

Radius (km) = only planning applications within the circle perimeter are returned (default 2)
bbox

Bounding box in the form of xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax, e.g.: `c(-1.3, 53.7, -1.2, 53.9)`
app_size

PlanIt classification for the size of planning applications. Values are `"large"` `"medium"` and `"small"`
app_state

Current decision status of the planning application (Undecided, Permitted, Conditions, Rejected, Withdrawn, Referred, Unresolved, Other)
app_type

Type of the application (Full, Outline, Amendment, Heritage, Trees, Advertising, Telecoms, Other)
silent

Do you want a message? Default is `FALSE`

Value

A (geographic) data frame

Examples

# tmaptools::bb("university leeds") # find a bounding box
bbox = c(-1.5, 53.7, -1.3, 53.8)
res = get_planit_data(bbox = bbox, silent = FALSE) # return geographic (`sf`) object
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=6&bbox=-1.5%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-04-18&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=6
class(res)
#> [1] "sf"         "tbl_df"     "tbl"        "data.frame"
names(res)
#>  [1] "address"        "altid"          "app_size"       "app_state"     
#>  [5] "app_type"       "associated_id"  "authority_id"   "authority_name"
#>  [9] "consulted_date" "decided_date"   "description"    "distance"      
#> [13] "docs"           "lat"            "link"           "lng"           
#> [17] "name"           "other_fields"   "postcode"       "rec_type"      
#> [21] "reference"      "source_url"     "start_date"     "uid"           
#> [25] "url"            "when_updated"   "geometry"      
plot(sf::st_geometry(res))
get_planit_data(fmt = "json", limit = 2, bbox = bbox) # return data frame with limit
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/json?limit=2&bbox=-1.5%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-04-18&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2
#>                                              address altid app_size app_state
#> 1 Skelton Moor Farm Pontefract Lane Halton Leeds LS9    NA    Small Undecided
#> 2        Skelton Gate Pontefract Lane Leeds LS15 9AD    NA    Small Undecided
#>    app_type         associated_id authority_id authority_name consulted_date
#> 1 Amendment     B2/B8 18/07851/RM          292          Leeds             NA
#> 2 Amendment 2,000sq.m 15/07655/OT          292          Leeds             NA
#>   decided_date
#> 1           NA
#> 2           NA
#>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         description
#> 1 Reserved Matters approval for two B2/B8 units (general industrial/warehouse) (Plots O and P) and new sub-station - NON MATERIAL AMENDMENT to 18/07851/RM - The NMA relates to Plot O and P on Logic Leeds and proposes to amend 4 of the approved plans listed in the plans schedule under the terms of Condition 1 of Reserved Matters Approval 18/07851/RM. The purpose of the amendment is to correct the layout detail shown on four drawings which did not include the final agreed position of the public right of way (PROW) which will be diverted through the site in accordance with the agreement with the PROW officer. The amendment also removes the detail of the substation which will be delivered via the separate planning approval on Plot K.
#> 2                                                                                                                                                                      Outline planning application with all matters reserved except means of access for the creation of a new community comprising up to 1,100 dwellings, a new food store (A1) (up to 2,000sq.m) a new local centre (A1- A5 and D1 and D2) (up to 1,300 sq.m), a new school and areas of public open space, together with the means of vehicular access at land to the east of Junction 45 and the M1 motorway and south of Pontefract Lane, Leeds - NON MATERIAL AMENDMENT to 15/07655/OT - Substitution of approved masterplan and associated plans within DAS. Please refer to covering letter
#>   distance      lat                                                       link
#> 1       NA 53.78766 https://dev.planit.org.uk/planapplic/Leeds/20/9/00096/MOD/

#> 1 https://publicaccess.leeds.gov.uk/online-applications/applicationDetails.do?activeTab=summary&keyVal=Q8VA11JBK1O00
#> 2 https://publicaccess.leeds.gov.uk/online-applications/applicationDetails.do?keyVal=Q8TFF8JBJTS00&activeTab=summary
#>                       when_updated
#> 1 2020-04-17T00:35:39.169000+01:00
#> 2 2020-04-16T00:52:44.144000+01:00
get_planit_data(fmt = "json", limit = 2, auth = "leeds")$description
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/json?limit=2&bbox=&end_date=2020-04-18&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2&auth=leeds
#> [1] "Part two storey and part single storey extension to side and rear, with rooflights to side and juliet balcony to rear - NON MATERIAL AMENDMENT to 19/06397/FU - Keep the rear dormer so that it meets the new roof of the proposed extension. Add rooflight to rear dormer. Lift the eaves' height of the proposed extension by 600mm."                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
#> [2] "Reserved Matters approval for two B2/B8 units (general industrial/warehouse) (Plots O and P) and new sub-station - NON MATERIAL AMENDMENT to 18/07851/RM - The NMA relates to Plot O and P on Logic Leeds and proposes to amend 4 of the approved plans listed in the plans schedule under the terms of Condition 1 of Reserved Matters Approval 18/07851/RM. The purpose of the amendment is to correct the layout detail shown on four drawings which did not include the final agreed position of the public right of way (PROW) which will be diverted through the site in accordance with the agreement with the PROW officer. The amendment also removes the detail of the substation which will be delivered via the separate planning approval on Plot K."
get_planit_data(end_date = "2008-01-01", limit = 2, bbox = bbox)$description # historic data
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=2&bbox=-1.5%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2008-01-01&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2
#> [1] "Conversion of garage to habitable room"                                  
#> [2] "Change of use of first floor toning bed salon to holistic fitness studio"
get_planit_data(pcode = "LS2 9JT", limit = 2, bbox = bbox)$description # data from specific postcode
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/applics/geojson?limit=2&bbox=-1.5%2C53.7%2C-1.3%2C53.8&end_date=2020-04-18&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=2&pcode=LS2%209JT
#> [1] "Alterations to entrance and windows to front of university building"                       
#> [2] "Consent, agreement or approval required by condition 2 of Planning Application 08/04348/FU"
get_planit_data(query_type = "planapplic", query_value = "13/05235/FU@Leeds")$description
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/planapplic/13/05235/FU@Leeds/geojson?limit=6&bbox=&end_date=2020-04-18&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=6
#> [1] "Full application for 189 new homes including affordable houses and elderly persons apartments, commercial facilities including retail and industrial/employment units and outline application for additional commercial uses"
get_planit_data(query_type = "planarea", query_value = "leeds")$description
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/planarea/leeds/geojson?limit=6&bbox=&end_date=2020-04-18&start_date=2000-02-01&pg_sz=6
#> Warning: Unknown or uninitialised column: `description`.
#> NULL
leeds_area = get_planit_data(query_type = "areas", limit = 2, auth = "Leeds")
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/areas/geojson?auth=Leeds&pg_sz=2
plot(leeds_area) # geographic outline of the area
#> Warning: plotting the first 9 out of 25 attributes; use max.plot = 25 to plot all
planitareas = get_planit_data(query_type = "areas", limit = 2)
#> Getting data from https://dev.planit.org.uk/api/areas/geojson?pg_sz=2
nrow(planitareas)
#> [1] 2
planitareas$name
#> [1] "Aberdeen"      "Aberdeenshire"
planitareas
